sentences.sContent: Under his visionary leadership, the city prospered.
sentences.sCn: 在他富有远见的领导下，这座城市蓬勃发展。

synos.tran: 空想家；梦想者；有眼力的人

remMethod.val: vision(想象力) + ary → 有远见卓识的

words.tran: 视力；美景；眼力；幻象；想象力

trans.tranOther: existing only in someone’s mind and unlikely to ever exist in the real world

trans.tranCn: 空想家；梦想者；有眼力的人
trans.tranOther: someone who has clear ideas and strong feelings about the way something should be in the future
